1370: Hornekinga was born in Oly straetje in 1370.
Got married to Geile at age 24 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Geile, Scilla, at age 24.
1371: Had a son with Geile, Radwardo, at age 25.
Lost son Radwardo when Radwardo was 1 years old.
1372: Lost daughter Scilla when Scilla was 3 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Geile, Reynwi, at age 28.
1375: Had a daughter with Geile, Ghodelde, at age 29.
1377: Had a daughter with Geile, Thedwi, at age 31.
1380: Had a daughter with Geile, Mette, at age 34.
1382: Had a daughter with Geile, Helyana, at age 36.
1383: Had a daughter with Geile, Gerburgis, at age 37.
